Method Detail

isFinancialSystemDocumentType

public boolean isFinancialSystemDocumentType(String documentTypeCode)
Makes sure the doc type represented by the code either is or is a child of the root doc type for the application (in the distribution, this is "KFS").

Specified by:
isFinancialSystemDocumentType in interface FinancialSystemDocumentTypeService
Parameters:
documentTypeCode - the document type code to check
Returns:
true if the document type code is within the KFS application space, false otherwise
See Also:
org.kuali.kfs.coa.service.AccountDelegateService#isFinancialSystemDocumentType(java.lang.String)

isActiveCurrentChildDocumentType

protected boolean isActiveCurrentChildDocumentType(String documentTypeCode,
                                                   String parentDocumentTypeCode,
                                                   org.kuali.rice.kew.service.WorkflowInfo workflowInfo)
Checks if the given document type code is either the active, current version of the parent document type code, or an active, current child of the given parent document type code

Parameters:
documentTypeCode - the document type to check
parentDocumentTypeCode - the parent document type code that the documentTypeCode should either represent or be an active, current child of
workflowInfo - a workflowInfo object to help us
Returns:
true if the doc type is a child or represents the parent document type, false otherwise

Description copied from interface: FinancialSystemDocumentTypeService
Determines if the document type code represents an accounting document

isLedgerPostingDocumentType

protected boolean isLedgerPostingDocumentType(String documentTypeCode)
Determines if the given document type code represents a document whose class is a LedgerPostingDocument or a maintainable whose class is a LedgerPostingMaintainable

Parameters:
documentTypeCode - the document type code to check
Returns:
true if the document type code represents a LedgerPostingDocument, false otherwise

isFinancialSystemLedgerOnlyDocumentType

protected boolean isFinancialSystemLedgerOnlyDocumentType(String documentTypeCode)
Determines if the given document type code is a child of the Financial System Ledger Only document type

Parameters:
documentTypeCode - the document type code to check
Returns:
true if the documentTypeCode is a current active child of the Financial System Ledger Only document type, false otherwise
